Research at The Open University

Open for business

Research publications

Open Research Online is the Open University's repository of research publications and other research outputs.

Facts and figures

Our world-leading innovative research and development ranks in the top third of UK universities.

Careers and opportunities

The OU research careers mission is to provide excellent training and development opportunities for researchers at all stages of their career
